title: healthy horse / life balance
desc: compartments you can fit a horse into

panels.alt: A cowboy riding left to right, smoking. The sun is up and there are birds in the sky
panels.text:
Me and my horse 
 get along well
panels.hovertext: occasionally catch up for a drink

panels.text:
but we don't hang out 
 much outside of work
